item.title: CVE-2024-37514|2024-07-21T07:16:34.676Z -- artistscope -- copysafe%20web%20protection
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ArtistScope CopySafe Web Protection allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CopySafe Web Protection: from n/a through 3.14.
